content:
The mushrooms grow differently
in each world! I've decided to name
all these different varieties Mushroom No. 1, 2, 3, 4, and 5!
info: 莎莎关于菌包闲聊_莎莎

content: When I'm running about, I often kick up mushrooms on the ground by accident, causing me to trip and fall.
info: 莎莎关于菌包闲聊_莎莎

content:
If you spot any in other Astralinks, make sure to bring them back!
I want to see! Let's line up Fungus Packs One through Five,
then see which one I can kick- uh, never mind.
info: 莎莎关于菌包闲聊_莎莎

content:
If only there was a super dragon-twister!
Blow them all away...
Just kidding, don't tell Mobai!
info: 莎莎关于菌包闲聊_莎莎

content:
Mushrooms are way too mushy,
I prefer something way cooler,
Something with more style!
info: 莎莎关于菌包闲聊_莎莎

content:
But Glenn says mushrooms are important pro... products?
Anyway, they're good stuff.
Fine, I'll try not to kick them away!
info: 莎莎关于菌包闲聊_莎莎

content:
<color=#d3b037>{me}</color>! <color=#d3b037>{me}</color>!
I just found out something super fun!
